Name: Interstellar_b39
Description:
REQUIRES CD2 beta 13, MEV v5.4 AND DEA b00.2. Recommended VEA. Interstellar, shortened as IS, is a spin off of FC_b23 with some interesting twists on modded enemies. 
      b39: 
    - Spitscreen Infector: TimeDilation reduced from 0.666/0.666/1 to 0.5/0.5/0.666, MaxSpawnCount 1/1/3/4 to 0/0/2 for 1/2/3p+ setting. SpawnAmountModifier 0.75 -> 0.5.
    - Escort Duty: Slightly reduce difficulty on 2nd/3rd phase of heartstone. During Refill, increase Weak Elite and Grunt Wave Controller spawn interval by +15/20s.
    - Sonic Bulk: Totally Banned in Escort.
    - Youngnought and Ice variant: +33.3% HP due to the DEA bug that makes their front armor not existing (you can damage its HP via the front armor).
    - Shredder and Shocker: MaxSpawnCount reduced by half, MinSpawnCount reduced to 1. (Everyone dislike these enemies so i will try to reduce spawn amount to lower amount.)
    - Cave Leech and Leech: SpawnAmountModifier 1 -> 1.5.
    - Korlok Sprout: SpawnAmountModifier 0.75 -> 1.
